biocontainers.name: rapmap
biocontainers.summary: Rapid sensitive and accurate dna read mapping via quasi-mapping

biotools.summary: RapMap is a tool implementing quasi-mapping and is capable of mapping sequencing reads to a target transcriptome substantially faster than existing alignment tools.

bioschemas.name: RapMap
bioschemas.summary: RapMap is a tool implementing quasi-mapping and is capable of mapping sequencing reads to a target transcriptome substantially faster than existing alignment tools.
